review: My sincere thanks to Dr Khusboo Bhardwaj for giving me lot of time and patience during the treatment.... God has blessed her with excellence in work and healing hands ... I wish her all the best so that she can bring smile on patient's  face and life ....Mam your support  and guidance  is deeply appreciable  ...Regards Priyanka Paul

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am coming  again after 5 years and must say thier behaviour and work is outstanding 
Will recommend to all 
Have visited many dentist but they took my work seriously 
Can see visible results .
They charge 5 times more amount than CGHS. For every visit they charge Rs200 for COVID protocol. *** **** ********* *** ** ***** ** *** ***** ** ***** ********** Not recommended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The staff is cordial and my treatment went really well. Most satisfactory thing was the way doctor explained everything related to my treatment. She was ready to listen and answer all my queries.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
